biotools.summary: The Assembly Free Linkage Analysis Pipeline (AFLAP) was designed to build genetic maps using k-mers. This pipeline takes raw reads as an input, compares the composition (Jellyfish hashes) of the two parents and identifies uniquely segregating k-mers. AFLAP may be applied to any organism for which a mapping population is available.
